title: Create Interview with Job Description
expected_result: Skill recommendations are displayed based on the job description

title: Select Skills and Difficulty Level

steps.input: Two years of experience in AWS

expected_result: Skills and difficulty level are saved successfully

title: Create Interview
expected_result: Interview is created successfully and public interview link is displayed

title: Verify Public Interview Link

steps.step: Verify public interview link is unique and valid

expected_result: Public interview link is valid and can be used as an application form link

title: Advanced Plan: Select AI Avatar (Optional)

steps.step: Select AI avatar (for advanced plan users)

expected_result: AI avatar is selected successfully and lip syncing aligns with the script

title: Verify Candidate Response Tab
expected_result: Candidate responses, including structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes are displayed

title: Verify Interview Score and Communication Score
steps: Select a candidate who has completed a video interview
Check the interview score and communication score
expected_result: The interview score and communication score are displayed correctly

title: Verify AI Analyze Scores
steps: Go to the interview screenings section
expected_result: The AI analyze scores are displayed correctly

title: Verify Comprehensive Summary
steps: Check the comprehensive summary of the interview
Verify observations, positives, and negatives are noted
expected_result: The comprehensive summary is displayed correctly, including observations, positives, and negatives

title: Verify Action Button
steps: Verify it allows selecting or rejecting the candidate
expected_result: The action button is displayed correctly, allowing selection or rejection of the candidate

title: Verify Ré Screening
steps: Create an interview and upload résumés
expected_result: The AI conducts a comprehensive semantic analysis and assigns a ré score correctly

title: Verify Ré Score and Recommendation
steps: Verify the AI recommends the profile for the next stage based on the ré score and job description
expected_result: The ré score is displayed correctly, and the AI recommendation is accurate based on the ré score and job description

title: Verify Interview Invitation
steps: Decide to proceed with a candidate
Send an interview link to the candidate
expected_result: The interview link is sent successfully, and the candidate can submit their interview within 24 hours

title: Verify Interview Screening Process
steps: Check the summary of the candidate's interview
expected_result: The interview screening process is initiated correctly, and the summary of the candidate's interview is displayed
